const capitalize = (s) => {
  if (typeof s !== 'string') return ''
  return (s.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + s.slice(1)).replace(" ","_")
}

let date = new Date();
let tz = aryIannaTimeZones.filter( x => x.includes(capitalize(input)) )[0]

if(!tz){
  print("invalid timezone")
}else{

    print(date.toLocaleString("da-DK", {timeZone: `${tz}`}))
}
